question: Which of the following statements is the best description of the project you are working on here?

answers.answer: We are creating a model to better understand what determines the number of COVID cases in a county.
answers.feedback: While we may gain insights into what is correlated with COVID cases in a county we will not know for certain what determines it. Please try again.

answers.answer: We are creating a model to be able to predict the number of COVID cases in a county.
answers.feedback: Correct. Given data such as population, vaccination rates, and other information, our Decision Tree will predict the number of COVID cases for that county.

answers.answer: We are learning about the biology of COVID transmission.
answers.feedback: There is no knowledge of disease transmission in this project. Please try again.

answers.answer: We are trying to determine whether SF county had more or less COVID cases than LA county.
answers.feedback: We can verify this from the datasets themselves but this is not our aim in this project. Please try again.
